problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,AO延长线交过点B的⊙O的切线于点C,如果∠C=20°,则∠CAB=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of ⊙O, and the AO extended line intersects the tangent of ⊙O at point B at point C. If ∠C = N_0, then ∠CAB = ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AO的延长线交过点B的⊙O的切线于点C,∴∠OBC=90°,∵∠C=20°,∴∠BOC=70°,∵AO=BO,∴∠CAB=∠OBA=\frac{1}{2}∠BOC,∴∠CAB=35°．故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了切线的性质以及等腰三角形的性质,正确得出∠BOC的度数是解题关键．
